insert into coupons (coupon_no, coupon_quantity,coupon_discountrate, coupon_startdate, coupon_enddate, coupon_category, coupon_name, coupon_issue_date, coupon_issue_end) values (#{no},#{quantity},#{discountRate},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{category},#{name},#{issueDate},#{issueEndDate})
mapper.update: update coupons set coupon_name = #{name}, coupon_quantity = #{quantity}, coupon_discountrate = #{discountRate}, coupon_issue_end = #{issueEndDate}, coupon_startdate = #{startDate}, coupon_enddate = #{endDate}, coupon_category = #{category} where coupon_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select coupon_no as no, coupon_quantity as quantity, coupon_discountrate as discountrate, coupon_startdate as startdate, coupon_enddate as enddate, coupon_category as category, coupon_name as name, coupon_issue_date as issuedate, coupon_deleted as deleted, coupon_issue_end as issueend from coupons where coupon_no = #{no}
select * from coupons where coupon_enddate > sysdate and coupon_quantity > 0 and coupon_deleted = 'n' order by coupon_no desc
select * from coupons where coupon_enddate < sysdate or coupon_quantity = 0 or coupon_deleted = 'y' order by coupon_no desc
mapper.update: update coupons set coupon_deleted = 'y' where coupon_no = #{no}
